short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for transcribe to support foot pedals of dictation module in DPS Spitfire system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DPS TeamTalk dictation module has implemented in the Spitfire system that can control the audio files by taking a support from this foot pedal extension.

Users are required to be installed "DPS Spitfire foot pedal" to use the functionality in DPS dictation module.

This extension enables foot pedal support to https://spitfire.dpscloud.com 

The following foot pedal(s) are currently supported:

-	Phillips Foot control for digital systems â€“ ACC2330
